summary:
Vege Token Global - Helping The Farmers Helping The World

 About Vege Token - Vege Token Global is The Pioneer Company In The World to Help Farmer using Blockchain technology

 Key features of Vege Token - Strong Community, Solving small business problems, Personal data must be isolated

 Why Choose Vege Token - Secured Farmers Database, Helping Group of Farmers, Big Data Insights

 Problem and Challenge - Sustainable Development, Uneducated Farmer, Indonesian farmers still do not use agricultural machinery, Difficulties for farmers to enter the market

 Solutions - Global Single-Platform, Be Safe and Secure, Decentralize Payment Systems, Blockchain Based DevOps Marketplace

 Our Products - Vege Token Mobile Apps, Vege Token Marketplace Dashboard

 VEGE Tokens - Sales Information, Token Sale Stage End In

 Why Use Vege Token Wallets? - Safe & Secure, Universal and Interactive, Send and Receive

 Vege Admin Dashboard - Introducing Complete Admin Dashboard

 The roadmap to success - What are our major goals?

 The Founder - Ni Ketut Kantri, CEO & Entrepreneur
